src_original: suvarṇabhāsôttamadundubhena śāmyantu duṣkhās trisahasraloke /
tgt_original: 金光明鼓出妙聲，　　遍至三千大千界；

src_original: apāyaduṣkhā yamalokaduṣkhā dāridryaduṣkhāś cêha triloke //
tgt_original: 能滅三塗極重罪，　　及以人中諸苦厄。

src_original: anena cô dundubhighoṣanādinā śāmyantu sarvavyasanāni loke /
tgt_original: 由此金鼓聲威力，　　永滅一切煩惱障，

src_original: bhavantu satvā hy abhayâhatā tathā yathâbhayāḥ śāntabhayāḥ munîndrāḥ //
tgt_original: 斷除怖畏令安隱，　　譬如自在牟尼尊。

src_original: yathâiva sarvâryaguṇôpapannāḥ saṃsārasarvajñamahāsamudrāḥ /  tathâiva bhontū guṇasāgarāḥ prajāḥ samādhibodhyaṅgaguṇair upetāḥ //
tgt_original: 佛於生死大海中，　　積行修成一切智； 能令眾生覺品具，　　究竟咸歸功德海。

src_original: anena cô dundubhighoṣanādinā bhavantu brahmasvara sarvasatvāḥ /
tgt_original: 由此金鼓出妙聲，　　普令聞者獲梵響，

src_original: spṛśantu buddhatvavarâgrabodhiṃ pravartayantū śubhadharmacakram //
tgt_original: 證得無上菩提果，　　常轉清淨妙法輪。

src_original: [ Bendall ed p217 ---> ]  tiṣṭhantu kalpāni acintiyāni deśentu dharmaṃ jagato hitāya /
tgt_original: 住壽不可思議劫，　　隨機說法利群生；

src_original: hanantu kleśān vidhamantu duṣkhān samentu rāgaṃ tatha doṣa moham //
tgt_original: 能斷煩惱眾苦流，　　貪瞋癡等皆除滅。

src_original: hanantu kleśān vidhamantu duṣkhān samentu rāgaṃ tatha doṣa moham //
tgt_original: 滅諸貪欲及瞋癡，　　降伏煩惱除眾苦。

src_original: ye satva tiṣṭhanti apāyabhūmau ādīptasaṃprajvalitâsthigātrāḥ /  śṛṇvantu te dundubhisaṃpravāditaṃ namo 'stu buddhāya bhaṇantu vācam //  jātismarāḥ satvā bhavantu sarve jātīśataṃ jātisahasrakoṭyaḥ /
tgt_original: 願我常得宿命智，　　能憶過去百千生；

src_original: anusmarantū satataṃ munîndrān śṛṇvantu teṣāṃ vacanaṃ hy udāraṃ //
tgt_original: 亦常憶念牟尼尊，　　得聞諸佛甚深法。

src_original: anena cô dundubhighoṣanādinā labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā /  vivarjayantū khalu pāpakarma carantu kuśalāni śubhakriyāṇi //
tgt_original: 願我以斯諸善業，　　奉事無邊最勝尊； 遠離一切不善因，　　恒得修行真妙法。

src_original: sarvatra kṣetreṣu ca sarvaprāṇināṃ sarve ca duṣkhāḥ praśamantu loke /
tgt_original: 一切世界諸眾生，　　悉皆離苦得安樂；

src_original: ye satva vikalêndriyâṅgahīnāḥ te sarvi sakalêndriya bhontu sāṃpratam //
tgt_original: 所有諸根不具足，　　令彼身相皆圓滿。

src_original: ye vyādhitā durbalakṣīṇagātrā nistrāṇabhūtāḥ śayitā diśāsu /
tgt_original: 若有眾生遭病苦，　　身形羸瘦無所依；

src_original: te sarvi mucyantu ca vyādhito laghu labhantu cârogya balêndriyāṇi //
tgt_original: 咸令病苦得消除，　　諸根色力皆充滿。

src_original: ye rājacaurabhaṭa tarjita vadhyaprāptā nānāvidhair bhayaśatair vyasanôpapannāḥ /  te sa-
tgt_original: 若犯王法當刑戮，　　眾苦逼迫生憂惱；

src_original: [ Cambridge MS f100b ---> ]  rvi satva vyasanâgataduṣkhitā hi mucyantu tair bhayaśataiḥ paramaiḥ sughoraiḥ //
tgt_original: 彼受如斯極苦時，　　無有歸依能救護。

src_original: ye tāḍitā bandhanabaddhapīḍitā vividheṣu vyasaneṣu ca saṃsthitāhi /
tgt_original: 若受鞭杖枷鎖繫，　　種種苦具切其身；

src_original: te sarvi mucyantv iha bandhanebhyaḥ saṃtāḍitā mucyiṣu tāḍanebhyaḥ /
tgt_original: 皆令得免於繫縛，　　及以鞭杖苦楚事；

src_original: vadhyāś ca saṃyujyiṣu jīvitena vyasanâgatā nirbhaya bhontu sarve //
tgt_original: 將臨刑者得命全，　　眾苦皆令永除盡。

src_original: ye satva kṣuttarṣapipāsapīḍitā labhantu te bhojanapānacitram /
tgt_original: 若有眾生飢渴逼，　　令得種種殊勝味；

src_original: andhāś ca paśyantu vicitrarūpāṃ badhirāś ca śṛṇvantu manojñaghoṣān //  nagnāś ca vastrāṇi labhantu citrāṃ daridrasatvāś ca nidhiṃ labhantu /  prabhūtadhanadhānyavicitraratnaiḥ sarve ca satvāḥ sukhino bhavantu //
tgt_original: 盲者得視聾者聞，　　跛者能行瘂能語。 貧窮眾生獲寶藏，　　倉庫盈溢無所乏；

src_original: mā kasyacid bhāvatu duṣkhavedanāḥ saukhyânvitāḥ satva bhavantu sarve /
tgt_original: 皆令得受上妙樂，　　無一眾生受苦惱。
